page.title: 17Weather in Wetton/Grindon
page.content: Oh, its not snowing again. Dad, can you get up and light the fire? Ey? Oh, forget it. Its freezing. I wonder what's on television? I'd better switch it on then zzzzzz oh no the weather's interfering with the television. I think I'd better switch it off. I know, I'll make myself a hot drink. I'll have to fill the kettle. Oh no, the churn's empty too, I can't be bothered to fetch fresh water. Dad get out of bed will you, "Shut up and leave me alone." I'll make muself some toast, oh, I forgot the electricity is off. In that case I'll do a crossword, Let's have a look ......... What's 3 across?
